titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain federally owned land located in Story County, Iowa.
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain federally owned land located in Story County, Iowa.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Requires conveyance of approximately 44 acres of federally owned land administered by the Agricultural Research Service which comprises part of the National Animal Disease Center in the city of Ames, Iowa, to the city of Ames and its assigns.
